add.help.description: Adds one or more groups to the current {{{groups}}}, {{{exclude}}}, or {{{include}}} options.
add.help.example.exclude: Adds {{{groupOne}}}, {{{groupTwo}}}, and {{{groupThree}}} to the current {{{exclude}}} option
add.help.example.groups: Adds {{{groupOne}}} and {{{groupTwo}}} to the current {{{groups}}} option
answer.help.description: Choose how to answer: by typing your answer, or via multiple choice. Options are the following, `{{{typing}}}`, `{{{typingtypos}}}`, `{{{easy}}}`, `{{{medium}}}`, and `{{{hard}}}`. Playing on multiple choice mode reduces EXP by (0.25x, 0.5x, 0.75x) based on difficulty.
answer.help.example.multipleChoice: Click on the button from {{{optionCount}}} multiple choice options to guess. {{{penalty}}} EXP penalty will be applied
answer.help.example.typing: Type your answer in the chat to guess
answer.help.example.typingTypos: Type your answer in the chat to guess. Small typos will be marked as correct. 0.8x EXP penalty will be applied
artisttype.help.description: Choose whether you'd like to hear from soloists, groups, or both. Options are the following, {{{soloists}}}, {{{groups}}}, and {{{both}}}.
begin.ignored.noTeam.description: Create a team using `{{{join}}} [team name]` before you can start the game.
begin.ignored.notOwner.description: Only the person who did {{{playElimination}}} ({{{mentionedUser}}}) can start the game.
begin.ignored.title: Begin Ignored
cutoff.failure.invalidEndYear.descriptio: The end year must be after or equal to the start year.
cutoff.failure.invalidEndYear.title: Invalid End Year
cutoff.help.description: Set a cutoff year range for songs. If one value is specified, only songs AFTER that year will be played. If two values are specified, only songs BETWEEN those two years will be played.
cutoff.help.example.reset: Reset to the default cutoff of {{{defaultBeginningSearchYear}}} to {{{defaultEndSearchYear}}}
cutoff.help.example.singleCutoff: Play songs released after the year {{{year}}}
cutoff.help.example.twoCutoffs: Play songs released between the years {{{beginningYear}}}-{{{endYear}}}
debug.description:
If you were asked by a bot developer to do this, give them this:
{{{debugID}}}
debug.title: Debug Details Sent!
duration.failure.removingDuration.notSet: The duration is not currently set.
duration.failure.removingDuration.title: Error Removing Duration
duration.failure.removingDuration.tooSho: The duration cannot be less than 2 minutes.
duration.help.description: Sets a maximum length for the KMQ game in minutes.
duration.help.example.decrement: Remove {{{duration}}} minutes from the current game's duration
duration.help.example.increment: Add {{{duration}}} minutes to the current game's duration
duration.help.example.set: The game will automatically end after {{{duration}}} minutes
end.help.description: Finishes the current game and decides on a winner.
exclude.help.description: Select as many groups that you would like to ignore, separated by commas. A list of group names can be found [here]({{{groupList}}}).
exp.bonusArtists: Guessing songs by the daily bonus artists
exp.bonusDescription: You can get bonus EXP for the following
exp.explanation.bonusArtistGuess: Guessing correctly for a bonus artist
exp.explanation.powerHour: Playing during a KMQ Power Hour or Weekend
exp.explanation.streak: Having a guess streak of over 5
exp.help.description: Shows your current EXP modifier, and the list of current bonus EXP artists.
exp.title: EXP Bonuses
fact.fun.bigThreeDominance: Fun Fact: BTS, Blackpink and Twice combined account for {{{bigThreeViews}}} YouTube views, or {{{proportion}}}%!
fact.fun.birthday: Fun Fact: {{{name}}'s birthday is this month on {{{formattedDate}}}!
fact.fun.companyByArtistCount: Fun Fact: {{{company}}} is the entertainment company with the {{{ordinal}}} most artists (including subunits and solo debuts) at {{{count}}} total!
fact.fun.companyByArtistViews: Fun Fact: {{{name}}} is the {{{ordinal}}} most viewed entertainment company with {{{views}}} total YouTube views!
fact.fun.historicalGaonWeekly: Fun Fact: On this week in {{{year}}, {{{songName}}} was the top charting song on the GAON Weekly charts!
fact.fun.mostActiveYear: Fun Fact: {{{year}}} was the {{{ordinal}}} most active year in K-Pop with {{{count}}} music video releases!
fact.fun.mostDebuts: Fun Fact: {{{year}}} had the {{{ordinal}}} most debuts with {{{count}}} groups debuting!
fact.fun.mostGaonAppearances: Fun Fact: {{{artistName}}} has placed on the GAON digital weekly charts the {{{ordinalNum}}} most times with {{{appearances}}} appearances!
fact.fun.mostGaonFirsts: Fun Fact: {{{artistName}}} has topped the GAON digital weekly charts the {{{ordinalNum}}} most times with {{{firstPlaceCount}}} first place appearances!
fact.fun.mostLikedGroup: Fun Fact: {{{artist}}} is the {{{ordinal}}} most liked group with {{{likes}}} total YouTube likes!
fact.fun.mostLikedVideo: Fun Fact: {{{hyperlink}}} is the {{{ordinal}}} most liked video with {{{likes}}} total YouTube likes!
fact.fun.mostMVs: Fun Fact: {{{artist}}} has the {{{ordinal}}} most music videos with {{{count}}} on YouTube!
fact.fun.mostMusicShowWins: Fun Fact: {{{artist}}} has won the {{{ordinal}}} most music shows with {{{count}}} wins!
fact.fun.mostViewedGroup: Fun Fact: {{{artist}}} is the {{{ordinal}}} most viewed group with {{{views}}} total YouTube views!
fact.fun.mostViewedSoloist: Fun Fact: {{{artist}}} is the {{{ordinal}}} most viewed solo artist with {{{totalViews}}} total YouTube views!
fact.fun.mostViewedVideo: Fun Fact: {{{hyperlink}}} is the {{{ordinal}}} most viewed video with {{{views}}} total YouTube views!
fact.fun.mvViewMilestone: Fun Fact: {{{hyperlink}}} recently reached {{{views}}} views on YouTube!
fact.fun.newMV: New Song Alert: Check out this recently released music video, {{{hyperlink}}}
fact.fun.oldMV: Fun Fact: {{{hyperlink}}} was released this week back in {{{year}}}!
fact.fun.recentGaonWeekly: Fun Fact: {{{songName}}} is the {{{ordinalNum}}} highest charting song on the Gaon Weekly charts last week!
fact.fun.viewsByArtistType: Fun Fact: There is a combined total of {{{totalViews}}} views on all K-Pop music videos on YouTube, {{{groupViews}}} (${{groupProportion}}}%) of which are from groups, while {{{soloViews}}} (${{soloProportion}}}%) are from solo artists.
fact.fun.viewsByGender: Fun Fact: There is a combined total of {{{totalViews}}} views on all K-Pop music videos on YouTube, {{{maleViews}}} ({{{maleProportion}}}%) of which are from male groups, {{{femaleViews}}} ({{{femaleProportion}}}%) from female groups, and the remaining {{{coedViews}}} ({{{coedProportion}}}%) from co-ed groups.
fact.kmq.guessRate: Fun Fact: {{{hyperlink}}} has a guess rate of {{{percentage}}}% over {{{roundsPlayed}}} rounds played
fact.kmq.highestLeveledPlayerStats: Fun Fact: The {{{ordinalNum}}} highest leveled KMQ player is Level {{{level}}}, with {{{songsGuessed}}} songs guessed over {{{gamesPlayed}}} games!
fact.kmq.longestGame: KMQ Fact: The world's (current) longest game of KMQ lasted {{{sessionLength}}} minutes, with {{{roundsPlayed}}} songs played, an average guess time of {{{avgGuessTime}}} seconds, with {{{numParticipants}}} participants! Can you beat that?
fact.kmq.mostActivePlayerGamesPlayed: KMQ Fact: The most active player has played {{{gamesPlayed}}} games since Nov 8th, 2020!
fact.kmq.mostActivePlayerSongsGuessed: KMQ Fact: The most active player has guessed {{{songsGuessed}}} songs since Nov 8th, 2020!
fact.kmq.mostActiveServer: KMQ Fact: The most active server has played {{{gamesPlayed}}} games of KMQ, with a total of {{{songsGuessed}}} songs guessed!
fact.kmq.mostCorrectGuessesServer: KMQ Fact: The server with the most correct guesses has played {{{gamesPlayed}}} games of KMQ, with a total of {{{songsGuessed}}} songs guessed!
fact.kmq.recentGameCount: KMQ Fact: There has been a total of {{{recentGameCount}}} games of KMQ have been played in the last week!
fact.kmq.recentSessions: KMQ Fact: A total of {{{recentSessions}}} games of KMQ have been played in the last week!
fact.kmq.totalGames: KMQ Fact: A grand total of {{{totalGamesPlayed}}} games of KMQ have been played!
fact.kmq.uniquePlayers: KMQ Fact: {{{recentActivePlayers}}} unique players have played KMQ in the past {{{xDays}}}!
forcehint.failure.notOwner.description: Only the game owner ({{{mentionedUser}}}) can use force-hint.
forcehint.failure.notOwner.title: Force Hint Ignored
forcehint.help.description: The person that started the game can force-hint the current song, no majority necessary.
forceskip.failure.notOwner.description: Only the game owner ({{{mentionedUser}}}) can force-skip the current song.
forceskip.failure.notOwner.title: Force Skip Ignored
forceskip.help.description: The person that started the game can force-skip the current song, no majority necessary.
gender.help.description: Choose the gender of the artists you'd like to hear from. Options are the following, {{{male}}}, {{{female}}}, and {{{coed}}}. Alternatively, use {{{genderAlternating}}} to rotate between {{{male}}} and {{{female}}} artists every round.
gender.help.example.alternating: Alternate between {{{male}}} and {{{female}}} artists every round
gender.help.example.coed: Play songs only from {{{coed}}} groups (groups with both male and female members)
gender.help.example.maleFemale: Play songs from both {{{male}}} and {{{female}}} artists
gender.help.example.reset: Reset to the default genders of {{{male}}}, {{{female}}}, and {{{coed}}}
gender.warning.gameOption.description: With only one group chosen, {{{alternatingGenderCommand}}} may not behave as expected. Consider including more groups to correctly alternate genders.
gender.warning.gameOption.title: Game Option Warning
goal.failure.gameOptionConflict.title: An {{{elimination}}} game is currently in progress. {{{goal}}} and {{{elimination}}} are incompatible. Play a {{{classic}}} or {{{teams}}} game to use {{{goal}}}.
goal.failure.goalExceeded.description: The given goal exceeds the highest score. Please raise your goal, or start a new game.
goal.failure.goalExceeded.title: Error Applying Goal
goal.help.description: Once the player with the most points reaches the goal score, the game ends. Calling it with no arguments disables the goal. If a game is in progress, the goal must exceed the highest score.
goal.help.example.set: The first player to {{{goal}}} wins the game
groups.help.description: Select as many groups that you would like to hear from, separated by commas. A list of group names can be found [here]({{{groupList}}}).
guessmode.help.description: Choose whether to guess by song title, artist name, or both.
guessmode.help.example.artist: Type the correct name of the artist to win a game round
guessmode.help.example.both: Type the correct name of the artist (0.2 points) or the name of the song (1 point) to win a game round
guessmode.help.example.reset: Reset to the default guess mode of {{{defaultGuessMode}}}
guessmode.help.example.song: Type the correct song name to win a game round
help.description:
Type {{{play}}} in chat and the bot will play a random k-pop song in VC. The goal of this game is to be the first person to guess the song name in chat.
See your current game options with {{{options}}}. Use `{{{help}}} [command]` to get more details about a command.
help.failure.noDocs: Sorry, there is no documentation on {{{action}}}.
help.help.description: Get help about the game's commands. Add a command to get information about the specific command.
help.help.example.allCommands: Shows all available commands and a short description
help.help.example.sampleCommand: Shows a detailed description for the cutoff command
help.title: {{{kmq}}} Command Help
hint.failure.invalidHintRequest.eliminat: Only alive players may request hints.
hint.failure.invalidHintRequest.multiple: You cannot request hints while playing multiple choice.
hint.failure.invalidHintRequest.noSongPl: A hint can only be requested when a song is playing.
hint.failure.invalidHintRequest.title: Invalid Hint Request
hint.help.description: Gives a hint to the currently playing song.
hint.request.title: Hint Request
hint.title: Hint
include.help.description: Select as many groups that you would like to forcefully include, ignoring other filters ({{{gender}}}, {{{artisttype}}}, etc), separated by commas. A list of group names can be found [here]({{{groupList}}}).
language.help.description: Choose whether songs played should be exclusively in Korean.
language.help.example.korean: Plays only Korean songs. Ignores songs that are in foreign languages: English, Japanese, Chinese
language.help.example.reset: Reset to the default language of {{{defaultLanguage}}}
leaderboard.title: {{{leaderboardScope}}}{{{durationString}}}Leaderboard{{{leaderboardType}}}
leaderboard.enrolled.description: Your name is now visible on the leaderboard.
leaderboard.enrolled.title: Leaderboard Enrollment Complete
leaderboard.failure.alreadyEnrolled.desc: You are already visible on the leaderboard. If you'd like to update your display name, unenroll and enroll again.
leaderboard.failure.empty.description: No one has earned EXP in this time interval. Now's your chance to go for first place!
leaderboard.failure.empty.title: Empty Leaderboard
Someone needs to score a point before this command works.
There is no game in progress.
leaderboard.failure.outOfRange.descripti: The leaderboard doesn't go this far.
leaderboard.failure.outOfRange.title: üòê
leaderboard.help.example.enroll: Allows your name to be displayed on the leaderboard
leaderboard.help.example.gameMonthlyPage: Shows the 2nd page of the monthly scoreboard containing players with points in the current game
leaderboard.help.example.globalPage: Shows the 3rd page of the global leaderboard
leaderboard.help.example.globalWeeklyPag: Shows the 4th page of the leaderboard, by EXP gained this week
leaderboard.help.example.serverSongsGues: Shows the 3rd page of the server-wide leaderboard by total songs guessed
leaderboard.help.example.unenroll: Hides your name from the leaderboard
leaderboard.unenrolled.description: You are no longer visible on the leaderboard.
leaderboard.unenrolled.title: Leaderboard Unenrollment Complete
leaderboard.validation.firstArg: Expected one of the following valid values for the first argument: (a positive number, {{{typeOrScopeOrDuration}}})
leaderboard.validation.secondArg: Expected one of the following valid values for the second argument: (a positive number, {{{argument}}})
leaderboard.validation.thirdArg: Expected a positive number for the third argument
limit.failure.invalidLimit.greaterThanSt: End limit must be greater than the start limit.
limit.failure.invalidLimit.greaterThanZe: End limit must be greater than 0.
limit.failure.invalidLimit.title: Invalid End Limit
limit.help.description: Set a maximum number of results in the song query. This effectively sets the "Top X number of songs" based on the selected filters.
limit.help.example.reset: Reset to the default limit of {{{defaultLimit}}}
limit.help.example.singleLimit: Plays the top {{{limit}}} most listened songs from the currently selected options
limit.help.example.twoLimits: Plays between the {{{limitStart}}} to {{{limitEnd}}} most listened songs from the currently selected options
list.currentValue.title: Current {{{optionListed}}} Value
list.failure.groupsInFile: Too many groups to list in a Discord message, see the attached file
list.failure.groupsInFile.noFilePermissi: Too many groups to list in a Discord message, see the attached file. Make sure that the bot has {{{attachFile}}} permissions
list.help.description: Displays the currently selected groups for a given game option.
locale.help.description: Change the language of the bot.
locale.help.example.toEnglish: Change the bot's language to English
locale.help.example.toKorean: Change the bot's language to Korean
locale.updatedDescription: The bot's language has been updated to `{{{language}}}`.
misc.failure.afkChannel.description: Ensure you're not in the inactive voice channel so that you can hear me!
misc.failure.afkChannel.title: AFK Voice Channel
misc.failure.errorSelectingSong.descript: Please try starting the round again. If the issue persists, report it in our official KMQ server.
misc.failure.errorSelectingSong.title: Error Selecting Song
misc.failure.game.noneInProgress.title: No Active Game
misc.failure.gameOptionConflict.descript: {{{optionOne}}} game option is currently set. {{{optionTwo}}} and {{{optionOne}}} are incompatible. Remove the {{{optionOne}}} option by typing {{{optionOneCommand}}} to proceed.
misc.failure.gameOptionConflict.title: Game Option Conflict
misc.failure.groupsExcludeConflict.descr:
One or more of the given {{{conflictingOptionOne}}} is already included in {{{conflictingOptionTwo}}}. 
The following groups were **not** added to {{{conflictingOptionOne}}}:
 {{{groupsList}}}
Use {{{solutionStepOne}}} and then {{{solutionStepTwo}}} {{{allowOrPrevent}}}.
misc.failure.groupsExcludeConflict.title: Groups and Exclude Conflict
misc.failure.interaction.alreadyEliminat: You've already been eliminated this round.
misc.failure.interaction.invalidBookmark: You can only bookmark songs recently played in the last {{{BOOKMARK_MESSAGE_SIZE}}} rounds. You must bookmark the message sent by the bot containing the song.
misc.failure.interaction.optionFromPrevi: You are attempting to pick an option from an already completed round.
misc.failure.joinError.alreadyInTeam.des: You're already a member of this team.
misc.failure.joinError.badEmojis.descrip: You can only include emojis that are in this server.
misc.failure.joinError.invalidCharacters: Your team name consists of only invalid characters.
misc.failure.joinError.noTeamName.descri: Include a team name to create a team or to join that team if it already exists (`{{{joinCommand}}} [team name]`)
misc.failure.joinError.title: Join Error
misc.failure.messageTooLong: Response message was too long, report this error to the KMQ help server
misc.failure.missingPermissions:
Ensure that the bot has the following permissions: {{{missingPermissions}}}

See the following link for details: {{{permissionsLink}}}. If you are still having issues, join the official KMQ server found in {{{helpCommand}}}
misc.failure.missingPermissions.descript: Hi! I'm unable to message in the {{{channelName}}} channel. Please make sure the bot has permissions to message in this channel.
misc.failure.missingPermissions.title: Missing Permissions
misc.failure.retrievingSongData.descript: Try again in a bit, or report this error to the official KMQ server found in {{{helpCommand}}}.
misc.failure.retrievingSongData.title: Error Retrieving Song Data
misc.failure.songPlaying.title: Error Playing Song
misc.failure.songQuery.description: Failed to find songs matching this criteria. Try to broaden your search.
misc.failure.songQuery.title: Song Query Error
misc.failure.unrecognizedGroups.solution: Use {{{command}}} to add the unmatched groups.
misc.failure.unrecognizedGroups.title: Unknown Group Name
misc.failure.vcFull.description: Ensure that there's enough room in the voice channel for me to join.
misc.failure.vcFull.title: Voice Channel Full
misc.failure.vcJoin.description: Something went wrong, try starting the game again in a bit.
misc.failure.vcJoin.title: Error Joining Voice Channel
misc.gameMessages.beepBoop.oss: Did you know KMQ is open source? [Check us out on GitHub and give us a star!](https://github.com/Brainicism/KMQ_Discord/)
misc.gameMessages.beepBoop.title: Beep Boop ü§ñ
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.artistType: You can pick whether you want to hear from soloists or groups using `,artisttype`. See `,help artisttype` to learn more.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.bonusArtist: There's a random selection of 10 artists chosen everyday that provide 2x EXP for their songs. See `,exp` to see the current list!
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.cutoff: You can set which years you want to hear songs from using the `cutoff` game option. See `,help cutoff` for more details.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.duration: KMQ distracting you from studying? Check out `,duration` to limit the length of each game. See `,help duration` to learn more.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.elimination: Raise the stakes and try `elimination` mode, where you lose a life for not guessing correctly ‚ò†. See `,help play` for more details.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.exclude: You can set which groups you *don't* want to hear songs from using the `exclude` game option. See `,help exclude` for more details.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.exp: Curious how your EXP per round is calculated? See `,exp` for a full breakdown!
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.firstGameOf: Your first game of the day will have a 1.5x EXP bonus!
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.gender: You can set what gender groups you want to hear songs from using the `gender` game option. See `,help gender` for more details.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.groups: You can set which groups you want to exclusively hear songs from using the `groups` game option. See `,help groups` for more details.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.guessmode: Tired of guessing song names? Switch it up by changing the guess mode to `artist` or `both`. See `,help guessmode` for more details.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.language: Don't like hearing Japanese/English/Chinese songs? Check out `,language`? See `,help language` to learn more.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.leaderboard: Think you got what it takes to be a top KMQ player? See `,leaderboard` and `,help leaderboard` to see where you stand.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.limit: You can limit the number of songs you hear from by popularity. See `,help limit` for more details.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.multiguess: Slow typer? Allow for multiple correct guesses for a given round using `,multiguess`! See `,help multiguess` to learn more.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.multipleCho: Song name on the tip of your tongue every time? Slow typer? Playing on mobile? Check out multiple choice mode! See `,help answer` for more details!
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.presets: Have favorite game option presets? Save and load them with presets! See `,help preset` to learn more.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.profile: You can see how many games you've played and how many songs you've guessed in total using `,profile`.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.profileInte: You can see a player's profile by right clicking their profile picture, and pressing Apps > Profile!
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.reset: You can reset the game options by using `,reset`.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.seek: You can pick whether each song starts from the `beginning`, `middle`, or `random` position. See `,help seek` for more details.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.special: Want to hear songs play in reverse, 2x speed, or 0.5x speed? Try `,special` on the official KMQ server found in `,help`.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.teams: Ever wanted to team up to defeat that insanely good KMQ player? Start playing with custom teams using `,play teams`! See `,help play` for more details.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.tempLeaderb: You can see the daily, weekly, and monthly leaderboard with `,leaderboard`. See `,help leaderboard` to learn more.
You can see the daily, weekly, and monthly leaderboard with `,leaderboard`. See `,help leaderboard` to learn more.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.timer: You can set a time limit for guessing each song by using the `timer` game option. See `,help timer` for more details.
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.title: Did you know?
misc.gameMessages.didYouKnow.typingTypos: Make a lot of typos? Try out `,answer typingtypos` to allow for minor typos in your guesses! See `,help answer` for more details.
misc.gameMessages.kmqServer.fanArt: Are you an artist? Draw some KMQ fan art to get an exclusive profile badge! Join the [official KMQ server](https://discord.gg/R55g4CRESW) to share!
misc.gameMessages.kmqServer.newFriends: Looking for new friends to play KMQ with, or want to play against the best of the best? Feel free to [come by](https://discord.gg/RCuzwYV) and say hi!
misc.gameMessages.kmqServer.title: Check out our Discord server!
misc.gameMessages.likeKmq.title: Like KMQ?
misc.gameMessages.likeKmq.vote: Give us a vote (and get 2x exp, see `,vote`) and leave a review on [Top.GG!](https://top.gg/bot/508759831755096074)
Have a suggestion for an alternate song name? Tell us on the official KMQ server!
misc.gameMessages.wrongSongName.title: Wrong Song Name?
misc.gameOwnerChanged.description: The new game owner is {{{newGameOwner}}}. They are in charge of {{{forcehintCommand}}} and {{{forceskipCommand}}}.
misc.gameOwnerChanged.title: Game Owner Changed
misc.interaction.bookmarked.description: You'll receive a direct message with a link to {{{songName}}} at the end of the game.
misc.interaction.bookmarked.title: Song Bookmarked
misc.interaction.guess.title: Guess the {{{songOrArtist}}}
misc.interaction.profile.inaccessible: I can't access that user right now. Try using {{{profileUserID}}} instead.
misc.interaction.profile.noStats: This user needs to play their first game before their stats are tracked.
misc.levelUp.title: üöÄ Power Up!
misc.playerAlreadyJoined.title: Player Already Joined
misc.playerJoined.title: Player Joined
misc.playerJoinedMidGame.title: Player Joined Mid Game
misc.playerJoinedTeam.afterGameStart.des: {{{mentionedUser}}} thinks they have what it takes to lead {{{teamName}}} to victory!
misc.playerJoinedTeam.beforeGameStart.de: When everyone has joined a team, {{{beginCommand}}} the game!
misc.playerJoinedTeam.title: {{{joiningUser}}} joined {{{teamName}}}
misc.sendingBookmarkedSongs.description:
Sending {{{songs}}} to {{{players}}}.

Bookmark songs during the game by right-clicking the song message and selecting `Apps > Bookmark Song`
misc.sendingBookmarkedSongs.title: Sending Bookmarked Songs...
misc.uniqueSongsReset.description: All songs have been played. {{{totalSongCount}}} songs will be reshuffled.
misc.uniqueSongsReset.title: Resetting Unique Songs
multiguess.help.description: Sets whether multiple people can guess a song correctly. When {{{on}}}, players will have 1.5 seconds after the first correct answer is given, to continue to answer. The first answer receives full EXP, correct answers that come after receive multiplicatively less EXP.
multiguess.help.example.off: Only the first person who guesses correct is awarded the point
multiguess.help.example.on: Allows for a 1.5 second grace period from when the first correct guess occurs. Multiple players are able to guess correctly
multiguess.help.example.reset: Reset to the default multiguess type of {{{defaultMultiguess}}}
news.help.description: Displays the latest updates to KMQ.
news.updates.title: Updates
options.overview:
Now playing the top {{{limit}}} out of {{{totalSongs}}} available songs from the following game options:

{{{priorityOptions}}}
options.perCommandHelp: Looking for information on how to use a command? Check out "{{{helpCommand}}} [command]" to learn more.
options.title: Options
ost.help.description: Choose whether to include OST songs.
ost.help.example.reset: Reset to the default option of {{{defaultOst}}}
play.elimination.join.description: Type {{{join}}} to play in the upcoming elimination game. Once all have joined, {{{mentionedUser}}} must send {{{begin}}} to start the game. Everyone begins with {{{lives}}} lives.
play.elimination.join.title: {{{join}}} the game and start it with {{{begin}}}!
play.exp.howToVote: See {{{vote}}} for info on how to vote. Thanks for supporting KMQ!
play.failure.botRestarting.description: Bot is restarting in {{{timeUntilRestart}}} minutes, please wait until the bot is back up!
play.failure.botRestarting.title: Cannot Start New Game
play.failure.hiddenGameMode.description: You do not have permission to use this command.
play.failure.hiddenGameMode.title: Hidden Game Mode
play.failure.notInVC.description: Send {{{play}}} again when you are in a voice channel.
play.failure.notInVC.title: Join a Voice Channel
If you meant to start a {{{oldGameType}}} game, {{{end}}} this game, call {{{playOldGameType}}}, {{{gameSpecificInstructions}}}, and then call {{{begin}}}.
play.help.classic: Start a classic game of KMQ (type in your guess first to get a point)
play.help.description: Starts a game of KMQ. Pick between classic (default), elimination mode, and teams mode.
play.help.elimination: Start an elimination game of KMQ where each player starts with {{{lives}}} lives
play.help.teams: Split up into as many teams as you want and see who you can depend on to help you win!
play.team.joinTeam.description: Team leaders, type `{{{join}}} [team name]` to form a new team. Remember, switching teams mid-game will forfeit all your current score and EXP.
play.team.joinTeam.title: {{{join}}} a team!
play.typeGuess: Listen to the song and type your guess!
play.voteReminder: Psst. Earn more EXP by voting (see {{{vote}}})
preset.deleted.title: Preset Deleted
preset.exported.description:
Import {{{presetName}}} as a new preset in other servers using:
`{{{presetImport}}} {{{presetUUID}}} [preset_name]`

Alternatively, load the preset's options directly using:
`{{{presetLoad}}} {{{presetUUID}}}`
preset.exported.title: Preset Exported
preset.failure.alreadyExists.description: Preset {{{presetNameFormatted}}} already exists. You can delete the old one with `{{{presetDelete}}} {{{presetName}}}`.
preset.failure.alreadyExists.title: Preset Already Exists
preset.failure.illegalPrefix.title: Preset Error
preset.failure.lengthyName.description: Preset name must be at most {{{presetNameMaxLength}}} characters.
preset.failure.lengthyName.title: Preset Name Too Long
preset.failure.missingIdentifier.descrip: You must specify a preset identifier. Use `{{{presetExport}}} [preset_name]` to retrieve a preset's identifier.
preset.failure.missingIdentifier.title: Preset Identifier Missing
preset.failure.missingName.description: You must specify a preset name.
preset.failure.missingName.title: Preset Name Missing
preset.failure.noSuchPreset.title: No Such Preset
preset.failure.tooMany.description: Each guild may only have up to {{{maxNumPresets}}} presets. Please delete some before adding more.
preset.failure.tooMany.title: Too Many Presets
preset.help.description: Various actions to save/load game option presets. Preset name must be one word long.
preset.help.example.export: Returns a unique identifier that can be used to load/import the mentioned preset
preset.help.example.import: Creates a new preset with name `preset_name` using an exported preset identifier ({{{exampleIdentifier}}})
preset.help.example.list: Lists all of the server's presets
preset.help.example.load: Loads the mentioned preset or preset identifier ({{{exampleIdentifier}}}) into the game options
preset.help.example.replace: Replace the mentioned preset's options with the current game options
preset.help.example.save: Saves the current game options as a preset
preset.imported.description: Load the newly imported preset using `{{{presetLoad}}} {{{presetName}}}`.
preset.imported.title: Preset Imported
preset.list.failure.noPresets.descriptio: You have no presets. Refer to {{{presetHelp}}} to see how to create one.
preset.list.title: Available Presets
preset.replaced.title: Preset Replaced
preset.saved.title: Preset Saved
preset.savedOrReplaced.description: You can load this preset later with {{{presetLoad}}}.
profile.failure.notFound.badUsage.descri: Make sure you're using this command correctly. See {{{profileHelp}}} for more details.
profile.failure.notFound.description: Could not find the specified user ID. See {{{profileHelp}}} for details.
profile.failure.notFound.title: No Profile Found
profile.help.example.otherPlayerID: Views a player profile based on their Discord ID
profile.rank.almighty: Almighty Ruler of the Solar System
profile.rank.supreme: Supreme Ruler of the Two Koreas
recentlyadded.description: The following songs were added to KMQ in the past two weeks:
recentlyadded.failure.noSongs.descriptio: Check back later to see if KMQ has added new songs.
recentlyadded.failure.noSongs.title: No Songs Recently Added
recentlyadded.help.description: View songs added to KMQ in the past two weeks.
recentlyadded.title: Recently Added Songs
release.help.description: Choose whether to include only official music videos, or all videos (b-sides, dance practices, acoustic versions, remixes, etc.).
release.help.example.all: Plays all available videos, including dance practices, acoustic versions, remixes
release.help.example.reset: Reset to the default release type of {{{defaultRelease}}}
remove.failure.noGroupsSelected.descript: There are no groups currently selected.
remove.failure.noGroupsSelected.title: Remove Failed
remove.help.description: Removes one or more groups from the current {{{groups}}}, {{{exclude}}}, or {{{include}}} options.
remove.help.example.exclude: Removes {{{groupOne}}}, {{{groupTwo}}}, and {{{groupThree}}} from the current {{{exclude}}} option
remove.help.example.groups: Removes {{{groupOne}}} and {{{groupTwo}}} from the current {{{groups}}} option
reset.help.description: Reset to the default game options.
reset.help.example.reset: Resets to the default game options
score.failure.noneInProgress.description: There is no currently active game of KMQ. Start a new game with {{{play}}}!
score.help.description: See the scoreboard for the current game.
seek.help.description: Choose whether each song is played from the beginning, middle, or at a random point.
seek.help.example.beginning: Song will be played starting from the very beginning
seek.help.example.middle: Songs will be played starting from the middle point
seek.help.example.random: Songs will be played starting from a random point in the middle
seek.help.example.reset: Reset to the default seek of {{{defaultSeek}}}
shuffle.help.description: Choose whether songs are played in truly random order ({{{random}}}) or randomly but uniquely until all songs are played ({{{shuffle}}}).
shuffle.help.example.reset: Reset to the default shuffle mode of {{{defaultShuffle}}}
shuffle.help.example.unique: Every song will play once before any are repeated
skip.help.description: Vote to skip the current song. A song is skipped when majority of participants vote to skip it.
skip.title: Skip
special.help.description: Hey. This hasn't been announced yet, but check out the KMQ server to try it out! Play a special mode with modified audio.
special.help.example.fast: Plays the song at a fast speed
special.help.example.faster: Plays the song at a faster speed
special.help.example.highPitch: Plays the song at a high pitch
special.help.example.lowPitch: Plays the song at a low pitch
special.help.example.nightcore: Plays a nightcore edit of the song
special.help.example.slow: Plays the song at a slow speed
stats.failure.title: Error Retrieving Stats
stats.footer: "Recent" statistics represent data from last 24 hours.
stats.game.title: Game Statistics
stats.system.title: System Statistics
stats.title: Bot Statistics
subunits.help.description: Choose whether to automatically include a group's subunits, when using {{{groups}}}.
subunits.help.example.include: Automatically include subunits. For example, `{{{groupCommand}}} {{{parentGroup}}}` would include songs by {{{parentGroup}}}, {{{subunitOne}}}, {{{subunitTwo}}}, etc.
subunits.help.example.reset: Reset to the default option of {{{defaultSubunit}}}
timer.help.description: Try your best to guess correctly before the timer runs out! Enter a time in seconds, or give no arguments to disable.
timer.help.set: In {{{timer}}} seconds, if no user has guessed correctly, the round ends and the next one begins automatically
vote.description:
Vote for KMQ on [top.gg]({{{voteLink}}}) and you'll receive 2x EXP for an hour! You can vote once every {{{voteResetDuration}}} hours.

We'd appreciate it if you could also leave a [review]({{{reviewLink}}}).
vote.help.description: Shows instructions on how to vote to receive 2x EXP for an hour.
